change.item: This finding aid was updated in alignment with LC EAD 2.0 specifications using a python script created by Erik Radio.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Diary describes a cattle drive to California, Jan. 31, 1890 to Mar. 29, 1890, by the Empire Land and Cattle Co. to escape high freight rates. Includes financial accounts, cattle records, notes on supplies.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: It is the responsibility of the user to obtain permission to publish from the owner of the copyright (the institution, the creator of the record, the author or his/her transferees, heirs, legates, or literary executors). The user agrees to indemnify and hold harmless the Arizona Board of Regents for the University of Arizona, its officers, employees, and agents from and against all claims made by any person asserting that he or she is an owner of copyright.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Diary of Edward L. Vail (AZ 271). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Diary describes a cattle drive to California, Jan. 31, 1890 to Mar. 29, 1890, by the Empire Land and Cattle Co. to escape high freight rates. Includes financial accounts, cattle records, notes on supplies.

relatedmaterial.p: Related material at Empire Ranch records, 1874-1944 (bulk 1880-1916) (AZ 246).
Series of articles based on this diary, "Diary of a Desert Trail", by Vail, were published in the Arizona Daily Star, Feb. 22, 1922 to Mar. 10, 1922.
